chat.line_0: Hi there! I'm a Graphic and Digital Designer student.
chat.line_1: I started my journey in the field not long ago, so I have only a few completed projects and others still in the creation process. I am in search of an official experience in the field to further develop and learn much more!
chat.line_2: My goal is to become a UX/UI specialist and be able to lead a team of web designers.
chat.line_3: I hope to be part of your team of Web Designers.
